    "POST",
    "/_application/search_application/my-app/_render_query",
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"},
    body={
        "params": {
            "query_string": "my first query",
            "text_fields": [
                {
                    "name": "title",
                    "boost": 5
                },

                    "name": "description",
